sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含"意见，建议"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: advice, opinion, progposal, suggestion, recommendation, view
means: advice ：普通用词，侧重依据个人经验、学识和正确判断而提出的忠言。
opinion ：日常用词，泛指对某事物的想法和意见。
progposal ：指正式提出来供研究、采纳或实行的建议。
suggestion ：普通用词，语气比advice婉转客气，也不如proposal正式。着重为改进工作、解决困难等提出的建议，有时含所提建议不一定正确，仅供参考的意味。
recommendation ：指在自己经历的基础上而提出的有益建议、意见或忠告。
view ：侧重指对重大的或引起公众关注的问题所持的看法和态度。

sentence.Network_en: Nearly 60% of our bookings come from repeat business and personal recommendation.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们近60%的订单来自于回头客和熟人介绍。

sentence.Network_en: The decision was made on the recommendation of the Interior Minister.
sentence.Network_cn: 决议是根据内政部部长的提议作出的。

sentence.Network_en: The WHO recommendation has no legal status.
sentence.Network_cn: 世界卫生组织的建议不具备法律效应。

PerfectNetExp.abs: a recommendation of the architectural acoustics design guide ., < 建筑声学设计指南 > 推介.
推荐信（recommendation）：国外的教授大部分都知道中国的教授好说话，对学生很友好，因而造成推荐信的水分很大，可信度不高 …
...报告，并提示错误描述（ Description）和推荐意见（Recommendation），可以根据情况选择修复与否。
叫建议书（Recommendations），基本上，建议书的角色主要在于处理还没成熟到公

list.abs: RFC2616——http协议_百度文库 ... “不应该”（ " SHOULD NOT"） “建议的”（ " RECOMMENDED"） 和“可选的”（ " OPTIONAL"）.
英语doing与to do的区别_爱问知识人 ... help 帮助 recommend 劝告，推荐 implore 恳求.
关于汽车专业的英语单词_百度知道 ... recirculate 再循环 recommend 推荐，建议 register 寄存器，记录器.

entry.def: The recommendations of a person or a committee are their suggestions or advice on what is the best thing to do.

example.ex: The committee's recommendations are unlikely to be made public...
example.tran: 委员会的建议不大可能公开。

example.ex: Lord Justice Woolf will make recommendations for reform in his report...
example.tran: 上诉法院法官伍尔夫将在他的报告中提出改革建议。

entry.def: A recommendation of something is the suggestion that someone should have or use it because it is good.

example.ex: On O'Leary's recommendation, they started with tortellini...
example.tran: 在奥利里的推荐下，他们首先点了意大利饺子。

example.ex: The best way of finding a solicitor is through personal recommendation.
example.tran: 找律师的最好方式是通过熟人介绍。

means.word_mean: 1. something (as a course of action) that is recommeended as advisable
2. something that recommends (or expresses commendation) of a person or thing as worthy or desirable
3. any quality or characteristic that gains a person a favorable reception or acceptance or admission;

sentences.sentence: "her pleasant personality is already a recommendation"
"his wealth was not a passport into the exclusive circles of society"

auth_sentence.content: That recommendation remains unchanged by Monday's task-force recommendations.
auth_sentence.res_content: That recommendation remains unchanged by Monday's task-force recommendations.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: That recommendation remains unchanged by Monday's task-force recommendations.

auth_sentence.content: That was one recommendation by a bipartisan presidential commission.
auth_sentence.res_content: That was one recommendation by a bipartisan presidential commission.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: That was one recommendation by a bipartisan presidential commission.

auth_sentence.content: I asked for a dining recommendation outside the hotel.
auth_sentence.res_content: I asked for a dining recommendation outside the hotel.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I asked for a dining recommendation outside the hotel.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表名词,"行为,过程,结果"; 2. 注：如果加在y结尾的单词后通常为去掉y加上ication.

stems_affixes.word_buile: revoc=revoke废除+ation行为,过程,结果→n.废弃,取消

stems_affixes.value_cn: 结合,联合;化合;团体;组合数码
stems_affixes.word_buile: combine联合+ation行为,过程,结果→n.结合,联合;化合;团体;组合数码
confirm证实+ation行为,过程,结果→n.证实,确定;确认
determine决心+ation行为,过程,结果→n.决心;决定;确定
excite使兴奋+ation行为,过程,结果→n.刺激;激动;激发
exclaim叫喊;感叹+ation行为,过程,结果→n.叫喊;感叹
ex出去+plan明白+ation行为,过程,结果→使其明白→解释,解说
generalize一般的+ation行为,过程,结果→n.一般化;概括,综合

stems_affixes.value_cn: 想象[力];空想,幻觉;想象出来的事物
stems_affixes.word_buile: imagine设想+ation行为,过程,结果→n.想象[力];空想,幻觉;想象出来的事物

stems_affixes.value_cn: 倾斜,弯曲,倾度,倾向,爱好
stems_affixes.word_buile: incline倾斜;偏向+ation行为,过程,结果→n.倾斜,弯曲,倾度,倾向,爱好
lament悲伤,哀悼+ation行为,过程,结果→n.悲痛,哀悼,痛哭
limit限制+ation行为,过程,结果→n.限制,局限性
oblige迫使,责成+ation行为,过程,结果→n.义务,责任
present赠送+ation行为,过程,结果→n.介绍;赠送;呈现
provoc=provoke激怒+ation行为,过程,结果→n.激怒
recommend赞扬;推荐+ation行为,过程,结果→n.推荐,介绍[信],劝告,建议
represent描述,表示+ation行为,过程,结果→n.描写;陈述;代表

stems_affixes.value_cn: 保留,保留意见;预定,预订
stems_affixes.word_buile: reserve保留,储备;预定+ation行为,过程,结果→reservation保留
starve使饿死+ation行为,过程,结果→n.饥饿

Sentence.sentence: Three letters of recommendation are required to apply to graduate schools.

means.word_mean: 推荐, 劝告, 建议(尤做法)

sentences.en: The government has agreed to implement the recommendation in the report.
sentences.cn: 政府已同意实施报告中的建议。

sentences.en: I wrote him a good recommendation.
sentences.cn: 我为他写了一封很好的推荐信。

jushi.english: The government has agreed to implement the recommendations in the report.
jushi.chinese: 政府已同意实施报告中的建议。

jushi.english: He bought the car on my recommendation.
jushi.chinese: 他根据我的建议买了这辆车。

jushi.english: I wrote him a good recommendation.
jushi.chinese: 我为他写了一封很好的推荐信。
